TopicTitle: Glitch? Or portal to another dimension? You make the call.

Articles.Content: Just noticed this slim blue circle out in the middle of nowhere. Does anybody else see this?

WTF!

Am confused now, could this be a new Easter egg? hope so and that its not edited in
It\'s the portal that the kraken comes from
Looks like just an orbit that got screwed up.

WTF!

Am confused now, could this be a new Easter egg? hope so and that its not edited in

I definitely didn\'t edit anything. I was time-warping to get the moon in the right position, when I noticed this tiny little 'orbit' out in the middle of nothing.

For the record, I\'d just started a new persistence file. I dunno what it was, but when I dropped out of time warp, it disappeared.

WHEATLY!!!!

Don\'t open unless you beat portal 2, spoilers ahead.

Wheatly is still on the moon. Seriously, you all play ksp you know that was not anywhere close to escape velocity.
